answers.answer: YAY!! I dreadfully failed my 1 hour but my 3 hour I passed with flying colors!! I'm so glad you don't have it this time!!
good deal when do they normally do that testing?  My Dr still hasn't done any testing besides u/s and blood pressure check

well since I had it before I was tested at 12w and passed but usually they do it at 28w which I am at now... they do it then because it is then that the baby starts producing insulin and will store all the sugar your body doesn't absorb as fat.. and the baby gets too chubby... :)  if you have GD your body isn't using insulin well enough to absorb the sugar it should...

well since I had it before I was tested at 12w and passed but usually they do it at 28w which I am at now... they do it then because it is then that the baby starts producing insulin and will store all the sugar your body doesn't absorb as fat.. and the baby gets too chubby... :)  if you have GD your body isn't using insulin well enough to absorb the sugar it should...

well since I had it before I was tested at 12w and passed but usually they do it at 28w which I am at now... they do it then because it is then that the baby starts producing insulin and will store all the sugar your body doesn't absorb as fat.. and the baby gets too chubby... :)  if you have GD your body isn't using insulin well enough to absorb the sugar it should...
Yeah =)That is such a relief to have over with... congrats on the good news!Kelly
YEAH on passing the gd test - what a relief!!

Congrats on passing!!  I'm waiting on my results now - had 3 hour test at 13w after stopping Metformin and passed and was just sent back for my 26w test.  Doctor had no faith that I would pass 1 hour since I average about 96-106 fasting when I test at home now anyway.  So I had the 3 hour last Friday - hoping I pass!!!
let us know how it went...
congradlations mel... Glad to hear all went well...Im still waiting on my results.
when did you take it?  I took mine yesterday and they already had my result at 9Ñ30 am

question: Amazingly enough.. I have had gestational diabetes with both my dd...  the last one I had to use insulin...  I took the test at 12w and all was good.. and I just took it again yesterday at 28w3d and I passed!!! haha I am amazed... the cut off is 130 and I was at 129.  She said before the cut off was 140 and I didn't pass then with my last dd.. but now it is less and I still passed.  so all is good for now.. I may have to take it again later but for now it is all good!  anyway I am happy!
title: Got the results of my GD one hour test
